flawed_nl_solution:
Linda has 12 eggs left, 5 of which are brown, so 12 - 5 = <<12-5=7>>7 are white.
Linda originally had 3 times as many white eggs as brown eggs, or 3 * 5 = <<3*5=51>>51 white eggs.
So Linda broke 51 - 7 = <<51-7=44>>44 white eggs.
#### 44

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
